text:
The food team's job is really just to help me 
get as much done as possible and they're great.

The food team are the machine behind Jamie. So that 
then if something does go wrong, which it rarely

does, but there's replacements, there are things 
that can come in, you know. They're always just

there to cut something off if it needs it. So this 
is the food team run by none other than Ginny. My

team, we get all of Jamie's ingredients and 
all his props and we set him up for the recipes

and we help Kate dressing all the tables and 
styling and choosing props and just making

sure the day runs as smoothly as possible. All 
the details, everything that you see on screen

has been touched by Ginny. Whether it's flower 
arrangements to choice of crockery, to what

food is going, where and when and how. I'm 
just jack of all trades. Chief washer upper
There's Julius on the floor. Lovely Fran. Lovely Jodine

Lovely Hugo. I think over the 20 years, Jamie's 
it's down to a fine art. So Jamie's on the set

cooking up some bruschetta's or something 
like that. While the food team are watching

on the monitors, they're also cooking at the same 
speed as him, so it's quite amazing sort of dance

that goes on in the background. This is a live 
feed of what Jamie's doing down on set. And then

here we set up with all the ingredients 
in the exact same format that he has

and we cook along with him and mirror exactly 
what he does so that if anything happens,

because obviously he's cooking 
but at the same time he's doing

lines and intros and that kind of stuff. So if like 
for example; he's toasting some nuts and they catch

or he leaves something in the oven for too long, 
we're able to concentrate a bit more and we'll run

down and swap it in. So yeah, that's kind of like 
what we mostly do up here. This is a very glamorous

prop store. So in here are like all the plates, bowls, 
cups, glasses, anything like that that we might need.

He likes this. If you ever watch his 
shows you'll see this bowl a lot

If he's ever doing anything like bread dough 
or those yoghurt flatbreads that he does quite

often. This yellow bowl with a little dip, 
keep an eye out for that guy. It's really

busy, his shows move at such a fast pace  and 
he's such a professional he gets through stuff

pretty quickly so you have to have everything 
ready for the next one. It's quite phenomenal

all day long. There's lots to be done. Yeah, so I've 
got a list of herbs. One of the things you learn on

the job is how to read his handwriting. We're all 
getting busy now because we're about to rattle out

the first dinner party So we've cooked everything 
once but now we're going to cook it again twice

Bless you. Right, let's go. Thanks 
guys, we'll stay out your way now
